Industry Dive - Washington, DC - Full Time

Industry Dive is a mobile-first B2B digital media company. We create and publish content across multiple platforms to help executives stay informed and connected to their industry. For example: http://www.retaildive.com/ and http://www.utilitydive.com/

We are seeking to hire a Marketing Programs Associate to help our clients create advertising campaigns that connect with our audience. We are also looking for talented writers and interns interested in writing, researching, data visualization or design. Details at http://www.industrydive.com/company/jobs/

Please feel free to contact me with any questions: eli at industrydive dot com.
